## Source: ossf-package-analysis (99dbda3abcbcaba1d8ad55ee9729dacd933b56584810185adf800536235ca224)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'cascading-picklists-extenstion' @ 2.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
